attributes.action: British Atheletes should boycott the china oylmpics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All athletes and british officials and the prime minister should not attend any offical functions relating to the oylmpics in china. We should give our support to the Tibetan poeple and denounce the chinese government.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
